verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w unto|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w among|strong="H1060"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* beast: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w mine|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w*: \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w bread|strong="H2557"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten.

\w This|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* Abib.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Amorite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w keep|strong="H5647"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w Unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, saying, \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H5668"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H3117"\w* shalt \w therefore|strong="H2063"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w its|strong="H8104"\w* \w season|strong="H4150"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w year|strong="H3117"\w*.
